sentences.en: He made some minor revisions to the report before printing it out.
sentences.cn: 在将报告打印出来之前，他作了一些小小的修改。

sentences.en: His brother ran a printing and publishing company.
sentences.cn: 他哥哥经营了一家印刷出版公司。

sentences.en: Men traditionally monopolized jobs in the printing industry.
sentences.cn: 在传统上，男人包揽了印刷行业中的所有工作。

sentences.en: Mistakes in the printing should be pointed out at once.
sentences.cn: 印刷上的错误应立即予以指出.

sentences.en: Our newspaper and our printing business form separate corporate entities.
sentences.cn: 我们的报纸和印刷业形成相对独立的企业实体.

sentences.en: Our newspaper is printing the full text of the President's speech.
sentences.cn: 我们的报纸刊登了总统讲话的全文.

sentences.en: Printing a black-and-white negative on to colour paper produces a similar monochrome effect.
sentences.cn: 将一张黑白底片冲印到彩色相纸上会产生相似的单色效果。

sentences.en: Printing visiting cards on a thirty - inch press is using a sledgehammer to crack a nut.
sentences.cn: 在30英寸印刷机上印名片简直是大材小用.

sentences.en: Printing was first invented by Chinese.
sentences.cn: 印刷术最早是由中国人发明的.

sentences.en: The book is completed and is ready for printing.
sentences.cn: 这本书已完稿,即可付印.

sentences.en: The electronic and printing unit has annual sales of about $80 million.
sentences.cn: 电子印刷部门每年销售额约为8,000万美元。

sentences.en: The invention of printing helped the diffusion of learning.
sentences.cn: 印刷术的发明有助于知识的传播.

sentences.en: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.cn: 印刷机赋予少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.en: To succeed, the new paper will need to break the stranglehold of the printing unions.
sentences.cn: 要想获得成功的话，这份新报纸就要冲破印刷业联合会的钳制。

words.tran_cn: 印刷业；印花布；印刷字体；印章；印记
[计] 打印机；印刷工；印花工
印刷；打印；刊载；用印刷体写；在…印花样

phrases.tran_cn: 胶印，平版印刷；胶版印刷；平板印刷
印刷方法，印刷过程；印刷制程；印刷工艺学
印刷机，丝网印花机；筛网印花机
丝网印刷；丝绢网印花法

trans.tran_cn: 印刷（术），（书籍的）一次印刷，印刷字体，一次的印数
trans.tran_en: the act or process of making a book, magazine etc using a machine that puts ink onto paper

trans.tran_cn: （在松软的表面）压印( print的现在分词 )，把…付印，用印刷体写，冲洗（照片）
